meanings.sent1: The surplusage of candy at the party made everyone happy.
meanings.sent2: The store had a surplusage of apples, so they put them on sale.
meanings.sent3: The surplusage of jokes in the comedy show kept the audience laughing all night.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like a surplusage of sunshine on a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The surplusage of stars in the night sky was breathtaking.

meanings.sent1: The book editor removed the surplusage to make the story clearer.
meanings.sent2: The surplusage of buttons on the shirt made it look too busy.
meanings.sent3: The surplusage of toppings on the pizza made it impossible to pick up.
meanings.sent4: His speech was filled with surplusage, making it hard to follow his main point.
meanings.sent5: The surplusage of ads on the website made it difficult to navigate.
